```{r}
library(mosaic)
library(tidyverse)
grb = read.csv("greenbuildings.csv")

grb$totalrent <- grb$Rent * grb$size * grb$leasing_rate
lm1 = lm(totalrent ~ leasing_rate + stories + age + renovated + class_a + cluster + green_rating, data= grb)

summary(lm1)
```
